name: Orbit (itch) (Mariostar7)
description:
My entry for MelonJam 3. The theme was "Capture", and I was inspired by its meaning in astrology, "(of a star, planet, or other celestial body) bring (a less massive body) permanently within its gravitational influence."

Visuals for the sun, planets, and background were generated using Deep-Fold's Pixel Planet Generator and Pixel Space Background Generator.

"Immersed" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
